title: Proposition to update all the old legendary skins. (And not just the splash art.)
body:
Some of these old legendary skins have no right to call themselves legendary. In comparison to some of the new ones, I feel like I've been ripped off.

If you take a look at Brolaf, then at Project Yi, you can see the obvious difference. Amount of new dialogue, taunts and jokes. Recall animations, New movements and different looks of their abilities.

For a guy who really likes Galio, Tryn and Olaf, I feel that there legend skins are sub-par compared to the ones released nowadays.

If this is too much, at least lower the price. Even to 1500 RP so people know.
